mapper.select: select m.TASK, s.SPACE_TYPE from MANUAL_TASKS m, SPACE_TYPES s where m.SPACE_TYPES_SEQ=s.SPACE_TYPES_SEQ order by m.SPACE_TYPES_SEQ asc, m.MANUAL_TASKS_SEQ asc
select distinct task_type from manual_tasks m, space_types s, task_types t where m.space_types_seq = s.space_types_seq and m.task_types_seq = t.task_types_seq and s.space_type=#{spaceType}
select manual_tasks_seq from manual_tasks where task=#{searchTask}
